alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 06 at 7:01PM EDT until June 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Indiana, including the following county, Hamilton. * WHEN...Until 845 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 700 PM EDT, emergency management reported ponding water on some area roadways due to slow moving thunderstorms with very heavy rainfall across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, Westfield, Cicero, Arcadia, Atlanta and Morse Reservoir. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
